text:
@Acosta Interesting, #Abilio .@Acosta.... 

Fifteen in 10 #Americans, yes 15 in 10, think you’re a #FakeNews; corrupt; lying; bottom-feeding; #leftist; smarmy; piece of #Socialist crap!!

The economy will be FINE once #CoronaVirus is over! .@realDonaldTrump WILL prevail!!

#MAGA #WWG1WGA
